name: MIGHTY MOUSE My Hero
description:
ALL NEW!!!!

"HERE I COME TO SAVE THE DAY!"

Get the ALL NEW Mighty Mouse My Hero game now featuring:
*Endless level for all four Worlds!!
*Bonus game!!
*New Power-Ups!!
*And MORE....

Mighty Mouse, the beloved cartoon superstar of yesteryear, flies into the 21st Century on your iPhone and iPod touch! Play as Mighty Mouse through four worlds of non-stop action, as he punches out a host of villains in an exciting fight to save Pearl Pureheart, his true love. Nothing makes a mouse happier than good cheese - collect it as rewards for accomplishments or purchase a wedge to gain power-ups and new costumes. Immerse yourself in this extraordinary, colorful cartoon world. With dynamic flight mechanics and a motley assortment of bad guys, you’ll be challenged and thrilled by MIGHTY MOUSE My Hero!

FEATURES:
- OVER 80 LEVELS in Adventure Mode!
- Endless Level Mode for ALL 4 Worlds!
- Earn cheese to get new costumes and incredible power-ups to help you save the girl!
- Catch and defeat Mighty Mouse’s adversaries, including Oil Can Harry!

PLEASE NOTE: iPod Touch 1st & 2nd generation devices (8GB/16GB/32GB) will not run this game. These devices are not currently supported by Mighty Mouse My Hero. The game works best when using the most current iOS software. If you experience any issues, please update your iOS to the latest version.

WE WANT YOUR FEEDBACK! Email us at mightymouseapp@cbsinteractive.com with Mighty Mouse game suggestions or if you have experienced technical issues.
